tool_description: An API showing product details  from nike store
name: Nike Products
title: Nike Products

api_list.name: Get individual shoes
api_list.description: Gets individuals shoes from specific category
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nike-products.p.rapidapi.com/shoes/men-shoes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nike-products.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nike-products.p.rapidapi.com/shoes/{shoeid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nike-products.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all shoes
api_list.description: this endpoint will return back all shoes like men shoes and women shoes.
